forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. West wind 17 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 29 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 49. West northwest wind 8 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
As the day unfolds over Downtown San Francisco, the skies offer a rare clarity, illuminated by the sun's gentle radiance. The temperatures approach a satisfying peak near sixty degrees, with kissing breezes from the west stirring things up at a brisk pace. Though the morning presents a fairly cheerful visage, it hints at a subtle transition, with shades of gray creeping in as the afternoon draws near, beckoning the temperature to dip slightly. A succession of swift winds playfully whips through the streets, creating a refreshing yet hearty atmosphere.

The evening promises a cozy retreat from the day’s breezy exuberance, settling into a comforting embrace of clear skies and cooler temperatures. A light jacket is advisable as one ventures out under the twinkling stars, perfect for strolling along the waterfront or seeking solace in a local café. The striking clarity of the day, unmarred by fog or heavy marine layer, invites exploration—a simple afternoon walk through the city’s vibrant neighborhoods or a leisurely sit in one of its lush parks seems particularly appealing. With the time drawing closer to sunset, now is the moment to indulge in the beauty of the city, experiencing its charm before nightfall descends.
